amendment.description: To increase the National Debt Ceiling of the United States.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 435 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 435 proposed by Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S4661-4662, S4677; text: CR S4661-4662) To increase the National Debt Ceiling of the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 435 proposed by Senator Stevens.
